name: Barium chromate
desc: Barium chromate, named barium tetraoxochromate(VI) by the IUPAC, is a yellow sand like powder with the formula BaCrO4. It is a known oxidizing agent and produces a green flame when heated, a result of the barium ions.
Other names:
Barium chromate oxide,
Chromic acid, (BaCrO4), barium salt (1:1), barium tetraoxochromate(VI)
